author: {'steamid': '76561198111032039', 'num_games_owned': 450, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 638, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 638, 'last_played': 1586212662}
review:
Revisei a biblioteca para fazer a analise do TurnOn.

Eu recomendo muito este jogo, pois, alem de fofo ele é muito bom, tem desafios interessantes e uma história bem original.
Vc aqui é bola elétrica que irá percorrer fios, equipamentos tentando retornar para sua casa e descobrir o que vc realmente é.
As fases são bem desenhadas a trilha sonora é bom e combina com o que vc ve na tela. É uma diversão garantida, embora não seja um jogo longo, se quiser platinar vai precisar quebrar a cabeça pois alguns segredos foram bem colocados e são faceis de vc passar despercebido e claro teria que refazer todo mapa para encontrar.
Recomendo ele como um jogo casual, para relaxar, passar o tempo e brincar.

author: {'steamid': '76561198429074257', 'num_games_owned': 1455, 'num_reviews': 1353, 'playtime_forever': 208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 208, 'last_played': 1645265478}
review:
Pretty simple and partly easy arcade game.
By controlling a revived electric spark, you need to help the city restore electricity in several areas. Turn on the lights, start the generators and air conditioners to complete the levels with three stars.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2758072895
You are also waiting for several "bosses" and a strange - but no less cute - the end of the game.

[b]Pros:[/b]
[list][*]+ Good graphics
[*]+ Nice soundtrack
[*]+ Simple controls
[*]+ Achievements
[*]+ Trading cards for sale[/list]

[b]Minuses:[/b]
[list][*]- On levels with a chase, the firefly has unresponsive controls.
[*]- Many bugs in which the hero can move through the air without using wires
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2758073120
[*]- Physics "jumping" from the wires in the foreground - to the background. Works quite clumsily.[/list]

[b]Result[/b]:
Pretty simple game, straight out of 2016. Good for both kids and adults.
I recommend the game for purchase - but at a discount.

author: {'steamid': '76561198134653495', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1641611634}

author: {'steamid': '76561198054690449', 'num_games_owned': 1377, 'num_reviews': 182, 'playtime_forever': 315, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 315, 'last_played': 1622182434}
review:
This game isn't very engaging and many areas are downright frustrating.  The foreground/background transitions alongside poor camera centering equate to a lot of blind jumps and difficulty telling where to go.  In addition, the autorunner sequences don't really give you enough warning or time to react given the controls.  Then there's that level with the rising current; the timing of the platforms was way off from a first cycle possibility and the rising shock doesn't stop during cutscenes.

Then there's that weird glitch where you float on nothing...

Turn away from this one, especially for a $15 price tag.

author: {'steamid': '76561198168731262', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1133, 'last_played': 1614739646}
review: It's adorable and soothing, and just the right amount of challenging. You might have to replay levels several times, but it's only rarely infuriating- the controls are simple, the soundtrack's sweet, if a bit repetitive, and the graphics are cute. All in all, 8/10, definitely worth the price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025675343', 'num_games_owned': 384, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 503, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 308, 'last_played': 1612589016}
review:
I really, really wanted to like this game. I really did. The art style's is adorable, the little spark you play as is just so cute, and I love that you move between the foreground and background layers in game. It was even made as a means of bringing awareness to Earth Hour, when everyone is supposed to turn off electronics for an hour to conserve energy or whatever. Everything about this game I should like is there. But there's a big reason I personally didn't enjoy this and I'll get into that after I explain what the game is about and like.

TurnOn is a side-scrolling puzzle platformer where you play as an alien entity made solely of electricity that can only move through electrical currents. You must use your innate electrical charge to turn on items to solve puzzles, collect energy, and try to otherwise help Electro City deal with a sudden blackout. Some levels are chase or fast paced platforming segments instead, and if you've ever played any of the minecart stages in Rare's Donkey Kong Country games, they feel a lot like that in a way mixed with a rhythm-based system. It's a nice idea, but maybe a bit much for this sort of game. Feels slightly tacked on but I get what they were going for - electricity moving to new places through high voltage wires, clever and fun.

The graphics are simple, but cute - I love how the little spark has its eyes move and squish as it moves along the wires, and I love the papery aesthetic done in 2.5D. It's really very cute and friendly. The music is also quite nice, if a bit generic in some spots and a bit unfitting in others. It's pretty clear that the creators just picked songs they thought fit, but it's a shame so many of them sound like Youtube Creator Studio stock music when it has a nice mix of styles otherwise. I feel that it should have stuck to either a gentle orchestral, jazz. or electroswing type feel, but instead it runs through many disparate styles and they just don't all work together even if they're all pleasant to listen to.

Now for what I didn't like. First off, the controls. WASD/Arrows is perfect for this particular game because you only move in four directions anyway (up is also jump which makes sense here), but I often felt especially on faster paced or timed sections that jumping was much, much more difficult than it needed to be. It somehow was both too loose and too precise IMHO. For example, when trying to jump up I felt like I should have a bit more height as the spark's hitbox doesn't quite reach enough to cling to the next wire on some jumps. I'm not a physicist or electrician, but come on, you're sentient electricity - I know IRL that electricity can only easily jump smallish gaps, but electricity has a charge, and charges attract opposite charges, so shouldn't it be a lot easier to cling to charged items like wires? I know this is a game, but guys... really? It's frustrating to have a wire just out of reach, especially when the spark can make some jumps that would reasonably be several feet away, yet can't seem to jump up and grab a wire that is not even a foot above its ball-lightning body.

Second, the foreground and background do not always make clear what can and cannot be jumped to. I often found myself falling off wires because I thought I could make a jump to another FG or BG object, but turns out no, you can't do that. This seems to happen without any real rhyme or reason, making some puzzles more difficult than they needed to be. Under this point I'll mention an issue I had with the platforming in general: some parts are so pixel perfect you have to be at the absolute tippy top or you won't make it, and some moving platform puzzles are even harder than they should be because trying to control the jump midair feels loose. Especially when falling down, I found controlling the arc of the jump difficult and a little too floaty, which made some types of platforming difficult. Furthermore, when landing, the spark tends to slide forward, making it difficult to dodge things coming at you or not fall off the platform. It was clearly supposed to feel good to go fast, but I can't go fast when I'm worried about how the next jump is going to land and IF it's gonna land in some cases. Also, this is a bit nitpicky, but I have never met a single gamer that truly enjoyed a moving-wall segment. Call me nuts here, but I'm pretty sure that nobody actually likes these. I get that the final level was a throwback to older Nintendo platformers with the tower, but come on. Make the platforming tighter so we can move quicker, or at least give us a break. There's no reason for the checkpoint to give you mere seconds to start moving when the wall of death is an instant kill, and there's never, NEVER any reason for an instant kill wall to move in a cutscene, that's just cruel for the sake of cruel. I picked up this game to relax, not yell at my screen because I can't make it to the next platform in time because the insta kill wall is right on my butt.

Third, the glitches. So many, so often. None really game breaking, but still. Several times I ended up floating midair for no reason, but still able to move. Sometimes the music breaks on some of the rhythm-minecart type segments, and sometimes it will reset your electricity counter or start you back at the wrong checkpoint during them. Button inputs occasionally did not work when I clearly pressed them. Sometimes, collectibles will not be collected, even if you are sitting right on top of them. A few times, I was completely stuck on the scenery bouncing or unable to move, but it got better. Once, at the start of a level, I randomly couldn't move at all and had to restart the level over. I'd think this must be to do with the spark's hitbox possibly being too small, same as with some platforming issues, but still. Glitches, they are there. I know this was more of a game jam type game, but you'd think there would be some more polish before you put it on Steam, that's all...

All things considered, I'm not so sure that I can recommend paying full price for this. TurnOn has plenty to like, but I did not have that great a time with it personally. Maybe it's that it's too short for $15 - it took me all of five hours to beat it, most of which was spent being frustrated at having to do the same exact rhythm-based minecart style levels twenty times just to get an inch further along the wires. Maybe it's because the platforming was too artificially hard, or the puzzles too easy, IDK. I wanna like it so bad, I wanna recommend it, but I can't. I'd recommend if you want a better platformer with tighter controls, pick up Hollow Knight or Sundered; if you want a better puzzle platformer, pick up Incredipede or Mutant Blobs Attack. If you really do want this game, wait until it's on sale for about $10 or less.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071324447', 'num_games_owned': 622, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1598261669}
review:
凄く楽しくて、一気に遊んでしまった。
光る球体を操作して、停電した町に電気を灯していくステージクリア型のゲーム。
ほとんどのステージは時間制限も無く、非常にまったりと遊べる。
強制スクロールのステージがいくつかあり、そこだけ操作性が悪い上に
好評価を得るにはどこにアイテムがあるか覚えるしかないのが少し不満・・。
それ以外は全て満足だったので、オススメです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198347305081', 'num_games_owned': 323, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 305, 'last_played': 1647316867}
review:
[b][i]Arrependido de não ter jogado antes, estava na biblioteca por 2 anos, manias de um acumulador. Apesar de não ter este marcador, TurnOn se trata de mais um indie de plataforma, do subgênero "relaxante" sem grandes desafios.[/i][/b]

[b]Depois que seu experimento falha, um cientista causa um apagão em toda a cidade. Você o ajuda normalizar a situação, controlando uma faísca de eletricidade muito cute.

A mecânica é gostosa, navegue por fios de postes e luzes. Os cenários mesclam elementos 3D com 2D de uma maneira satisfatória, com fases bem variadas, muitos detalhes e animações. Pensei que se tornaria repetitivo, mas a dinâmica dos puzzles consegue ser alternativa, sem cair na mesmice.

Gráfico singelo, mas bem detalhado e com uma paleta de cores bonita e "viva". Destaque também para a trilha sonora, bem diversificada e relaxante.[/b]

[i][b]3 Reais em sale, conquistas, cartas. Só vai.[/b][/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198003702727', 'num_games_owned': 1306, 'num_reviews': 283, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1470842982}
review:
Seguí este juego cuando lo iban a lanzar al mercado allá por 2016.

Es un juego curioso donde eres una especie de electricidad que tiene que ir encendiendo luces de todo tipo para poder avanzar. Gráficamente es resultón, no es que sea un portento, pero es agradable de ver.

A nivel de jugabilidad no esperes un título que te ponga de los nervios o haga que tus sentidos estén al 100%, es un juego para pasar el rato tranquilo, sin presiones.

A mi me pareció curioso y lo pillé.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007627220', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 165, 'playtime_forever': 309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 309, 'last_played': 1574976810}
review:
[h1]Приятный и атмосферный платформер.[/h1]

Однажды из космоса упала маленькая искорка. Да так упала, что обесточила весь город. Она встретила работника электростанции который решил помочь ей вернуть в город свет и радость :)

Искорка может бегать по проводам и перепрыгивать с одного на другой. Получается классический платфомер. Проходя мимо лампочек или щитков мы даём туда электричество и на улице появляется освещение и в домах появляется свет. Это и есть основная фишка игры. Очень доставляет, когда путешествуешь по пригороду или торговому центру, а вокруг загораются лампочки, витрины и свет в окнах такой разноцветный. Впечатления немного портит только последний эпизод на небоскрёбах. Там надо просто долго прыгать вверх. И никакого света.  Между эпизодами встречаются уровни гонки, где надо нестись по проводам под музыку и если делать всё во время, то получается не плохая мелодия. Напоминает [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/63710/BITTRIP_RUNNER/]Bit.Trip Runner[/url].

Графика в игре так себе, средненько. Но ситуацию спасает атмосфера и разнообразие. Мы побываем и в порту и в парке, в магазине и полицейском участке. И смотреть, как город наполняется светом очень приятно. Огорчают только сюжетные вставки между эпизодами. Они убого нарисованы. Похоже у разработчиков художника не было.
А вот музыка просто отличная. Спокойные блюзовые мелодии мне очень понравились. А в гонках, наоборот, музыка быстрая, веселая и очень в тему.

Игра мне очень понравилась. Ребята старались и сделали хорошо. Попробуйте, рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075673573', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 272, 'playtime_forever': 238, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 238, 'last_played': 1584481678}
review:
I rate the platformer adventure game TurnOn 3.5/5. Pretty good, especially considering how this game had a very small development team (something like 4 people only).

EDIT: (THIS GAME WAS MADE BY RUSSIANS, THEREFORE I CAN IN GOOD CONSCIENCE NO LONGER RECOMMEND THIS GAME DUE TO THE RUSSIAN INVASION OF UKRAINE).


TurnOn is a platform game wherein you control a cute little electrical alien orb which jumps from powerline to powerline turning on various electrical appliances (usually lights and generators) to bring power back to a city which has gone dark due (I guess) to an electromagnetic pulse from a passing asteroid (I guess the same asteroid that brought you to the planet to begin with). Or perhaps you were created or otherwise drawn to the surface by some weird scientist guy. 

This game, which features no real dialog, is very light on explanation concerning exactly what is going on and why. The cut-scenes leave a lot of room for interpretation also. It is fun to jump around on powerlines and turn lights on as you go but there are several segments here and there (which act like boss levels of a sort) which can be frustrating and have a much higher difficulty than the rest of the game.

+Somewhat innovative and strange platform gameplay, forcing a two-dimensional control scheme into a quasi-three dimensional environment (sometimes you can jump to a distant powerline by simply jumping up or down from the line you are at, even if it is in the background or foreground). I’m really not sure how to describe it. Merely jumping up or down can, if there is a place to jump to, cause you to jump either into the foreground or into the distance.

+Your character really is amazingly adorable despite the fact that it is essentially a bolt of electricity with a face.

+Nice, artistic artistry and colorful lighting effects.

+This game is not necessarily simply a children’s game. Despite TurnOn’s generally high level of cuteness, there is a lot of urban decay depicted in this game including lots of empty beer bottles laying around, destroyed cars and some ghetto style street parties here and there. Poverty and some of its effects are prominently depicted along with some of the crime that same poverty creates. There is some social commentary hinted at in the inner city scenes this game shows you. This game takes place in a city and it does not shy away from how the city can be an ugly place to be forced to live in when you don’t have money and how that state of affairs can be even worse if there’s no electricity or other services.

+/-Controls are very responsive but I often wished that my character could jump just a little bit higher. Responds well with a keyboard but it’s best to be very proficient with a keyboard if you play this game on one like I did. A controller is NOT absolutely necessary however. 

+/-OK sound though the constant electrical zapping sounds could get irritating over time. The music is mostly mediocre but can be fairly good in places, especially during the nice ending level.

-Extremely uneven difficulty. Most levels are very easy but some levels are crazy hard and some of these happen fairly early in the game (like the one where you have to defeat the weird malfunctioning flying drone and the ones where you are forced to race along on long-distance power lines at breakneck speed) These frustrating areas sort of act as boss levels between the far better designed normal areas where you just have to solve some simple puzzles and light stuff up as you make your way from point A to point B. TurnOn can become fairly challenging and frustrating very quickly with little warning. New gameplay elements occasionally come into play with no introduction or explanation of those elements whatsoever. You simply have to adapt as you go along. To decrease frustration it’s probably best to play this game in short bursts rather than for hours on end.

-No character upgrades in this game. The abilities your character has at the start of the game are the same abilities your character has at the game’s end.

-Most menus are self-explanatory and simple but the status display which appears at the top left of the screen as you actually play is a bit strange and seems mostly irrelevant.

-Fairly short game which took me only 4 hours to adequately complete. Early levels will spam you with steam achievements.

-No good explanation as to why the majority of the city’s power grid is ultimately controlled by this one generator on top of the city’s tallest building. It felt as though more levels were planned but were never made.

-Highly linear game with no alternate endings or choices to make. No way to be an A-hole and turn everyone’s lights off instead. No replay value as a result.

-TurnOn sounds like it should be some sort of a hentai sex game but it isn’t.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046836998', 'num_games_owned': 447, 'num_reviews': 259, 'playtime_forever': 397, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 397, 'last_played': 1581059435}
review:
本身游戏挺好，卡通的画风，游戏性也不错，本身想开开心心给个好评，但是我发现了一个恶意关，列车之后有一关，属于酷跑关，那一关有很多的坑，而且有一部分坑，要么会有树挡你视野，要么会冷不丁的出现一个红色扣血道具，让你冷不丁的跳一下，然后这一跳你会无法修正的直接坠落，然后重新开始。本身一个暖暖的游戏，让这一关弄得印象十分不好。不是说不能有坑，就跟写作文一样，你把主题，开头，都用古风来写，然后快到结尾了来一段赛博朋克，这就显得格格不入。
由此我给这个游戏6/10，可以及格，但是存在令人反感的缺陷。

author: {'steamid': '76561198979803242', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1565864204}
review: 真的想玩跳跳乐的话还是打折再入手吧，玩了这个游戏我才发现我有多讨厌跳跳乐。。

author: {'steamid': '76561198079143796', 'num_games_owned': 527, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 169, 'last_played': 1575661982}
review:
나는 지나친 폭력을 즐길거리로 묘사하는 게임이 좋다.
유혈극에 뇌가 절은 흥부는... 형수님도 없고 하니 흥분되지를 못해요 힝힝

그래도 괜찮은 게임이라고 생각해서, 계속 진행하려고 했는데...
점프거리가 절대로 닿지 않는데, 닿아야만 진행이 되는 구간이 있다.. (Unusual Date)
이상하게도, 다른 플레이어들은 평범하게 점프해서 잘만 넘어가는데... 왜 나는 안되지 ㅡㅡ
알고 보니, 그 구간은 아날로그 스틱으로 조작을 하면 절대로 성공 못하는 것이었다.
키보드나 컨트롤러의 십자패드를 써야만 점프거리가 닿는 것이다...

LOST의 권진수처럼 분노조절장애가 오려고 해서, 이 게임은 하지 않기로 했다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198209436765', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 562, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 562, 'last_played': 1548766625}
review:
Грустно писать негативный отзыв, но игра не впечатлила.
[b]Графоуни[/b]. На скриншотах выглядит красивенько, на деле сильно напоминает трешовые игры нулевых. Плоско, пластилиново, быстро приедается. Комиксовые вставки сделаны очень небрежно. ОЧЕНЬ. Визуалы идут лесом.
[b]Сложность[/b] в игре ужасно несбалансирована: есть обычные чилл-уровни, которые можно исследовать без напряга, а есть раннеры, которые бесят. Сюжетка, кстати, очень короткая, и кроме нее контента нет. Такое ощущение, что с помощью "сложных" уровней игру хотели искусственно продлить. Хардкорщикам не зайдет, ибо скучно, желающих отдохнуть и расслабиться ждут неприятные сюрпризы, так что и те, и другие хмуро догоняют визуалов.
Отдельная боль - [b]звуковое сопровождение[/b]. Звуки кричащих/радующихся людей (стоковые, не иначе) раздражают даже если слышишь их однократно, так они еще и зациклены. В пресловутых раннерах музыка начинается с определенного момента после каждого фейла, и через некоторое время ее очень хочется выключить. Аудиалы присоединяются к процессии.
Вопросы экологии, упомянутые в описании, притянуты за уши. Игра вообще не дает понять, почему важно беречь электричество, и не отражает реальных проблем, которые может повлечь за собой относительно крупный сбой в питании. Собака напала на девочку в темном переулке, поэтому нужно сбросить гигантский хот-дог с вывески, чтобы ее отвлечь?.. Окей, это попытка в юмор, но все остальные ситуации столь же поверхностные, а мы только и делаем, что зажигаем фонарики для человечков, которые не вызывают ни малейшей симпатии.
Итог - пресно, по полной цене брать однозначно не стоит, по скидке тоже сомнительно. Возможно, коллекционеров привлечет количество ачивок и значок в виде лампочки, но на фоне скучного геймплея и странного дизайна это слабое утешение.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021303887', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 190, 'playtime_forever': 481, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 481, 'last_played': 1548694661}
review:
TurnOn c'est l'histoire d'une petite boule d'électricité qui doit ramener le courant partout dans une ville, voilà pour le speech. Vous devrez passer simplement sur des ampoules et autres générateurs tout en crapahutant d'une ligne électrique à l'autre pour que la lumière soit à nouveau. Rien de compliqué en soi.
Le jeu compte une trentaine de niveau avec parfois des niveaux de "course-poursuite" assez frustrants, je veux dire par-là qu'on passe d'un super jeu de "plate-formes" limite super zen, où l'on prends grand plaisir à diriger notre petite boule électrique à du presque "die and retry" ! Après ces niveaux là ne sont heureusement pas nombreux (4 ou ( il me semble) et si vous ne cherchez pas à avoir les 3 étoiles de fin de niveau vous les passerez quand même assez facilement après quelques essais, que cela ne vous freine pas si vous hésitez à acheter le jeu.
Je vous parlais du nombre de niveau, on pourrait croire qu'il y en a beaucoup mais ils ne sont pas très long et, une fois encore, si vous ne cherchez pas les 3 étoiles vous arriverez très vite à bout du titre. Pour les chasseurs de succès le jeu sera juste long comme il faut (comptez entre 5-7 heures je pense) pour le 100%.
A noter que les musiques collent très bien, assez calme dans les phases plate-formes et un peu plus stressantes dans les phases défilantes.
En tout cas j'ai passé un agréable moment sur ce titre que je ne connaissais pas, merci la mise en avant des titres en soldes de Steam.

Les + :
+ Les musiques qui collent bien à l'action.
+ Le principe du jeu.
+ Facile à prendre en main.
+ Assez bonne durée de vie pour le genre.
+ Succès faciles à avoir pour les chasseurs.
+ Phases de plate-formes relaxante et plaisantes à jouer...

Les - :
- ...tandis que les phases de courses-poursuites seront parfois agaçantes.
- Techniquement un peu à la ramasse mais le style graphique est sympa quand même.
- On en aimerais encore après avoir fini le jeu ! xD

14/20

author: {'steamid': '76561198058232744', 'num_games_owned': 500, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 287, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 287, 'last_played': 1548629552}

author: {'steamid': '76561198171769655', 'num_games_owned': 325, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1620736802}
review: Turn On - очень милая инди игра (кстати от отечественных разработчиков) в которую не сложно, но интересно играть, мы - синий электро-шарик, спасающий город от тьмы и ночных хулиганов. мы утешаем плачущих полицейских и заставляем улыбаться ученых (и попутно решаем загадки). Что может быть лучше :3 даже есть одно достижение - игра в разработке 2 года (в честь мучений создателей). Музыка просто потрясающая, мало в каких играх я слышала такие разные композиции. В общем, всем советую. Есть комиксные вставки, чтобы можно было понять кому мы будем помогать и левелы на скорость реакции

author: {'steamid': '76561198030617999', 'num_games_owned': 663, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 336, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1587276565}
review: A cute little platformer about playing a ball of electricity navigating along power lines. The shifts in perspective from foreground to background are interesting and the use of set-pieces make each level feel unique. No section is outright frustrating but the game does increase in difficulty with only the last boss feeling a tad on the cheap side.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071914212', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 317, 'last_played': 1545987793}
review:
个人通关用了5小时，大概三十来关，大部分是平台跳跃收集，没什么难度，五六关音游关，这是主要的浪费时间的地方；
游戏上值得说的地方就是布局上看起来是3D场景，实际游玩的时候是2D，你往上往下跳镜头直接跟过来；
除了音游关难度，甚至比较适合小孩子玩，真正的全年龄游戏；
这游戏我入得挺早的，因为这游戏一出就有中文，好评；
嗯，说说音游关，摇滚风，手残可能要花点时间，高手基本可以无视，主要就是操作上只有上下移动，习惯了就好；有一关音游关有个三连平台，你第一个平台跳晚了，到了第二个平台会因为惯性直接掉下去……
打折的时候史低看着入吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561198010492777', 'num_games_owned': 373, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 143, 'last_played': 1545943969}
review:
Irritating little puzzle-platformer. Imagine if Limbo was obtuse, had escort missions and very, very poorly telegraphed geography. You're a little electric ball. You live on powerlines. OK, fine. DID YOU KNOW? You can effortlessly roll from one blue line to another, via the black telephone pole arms? But you can't move on other black objects. Traversal is effortless, except when the tools you are given to climb or descend are just out of reach, for no real reason - it's a casual game, not a precision platformer.

The sound effects are unbelievably painful - not the music or the orb, they're fine. But the people - quivering scientists, shrieking babies (really) and other townsfolk all have exactly 1 sound each, play it constantly, and you can't turn it off or you miss important sound cues.

I want to like this game - casual puzzle-platformers are extremely my jam - but it's just annoying enough in just enough ways to be a pass instead of a recommend from me. And I paid $1.50. At $15, I'd be incredibly salty.

review: Enchanteur du début à la fin. L’expérience est courte mais délicieuse et réussie. En ce qui me concerne, c'est un petit coup de coeur.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072153080', 'num_games_owned': 175, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1542998328}
review:
This game is perfect to take it easy after a long day of work/school/gamming hard/ pretty much anything... It is a very relaxing game, nice music, easy controls, funny-cute story, good graphics/art/animations, the sounds of some characters/objects made me smile a lot!! The achievements are not that hard to get... This game has all!! You might die/fail, so what? Nothing bad happens. The little things this game has, make it really good :) 
Just buy it!! It is worth the shot. You do not want to spend the money, then buy it on sale like I did (for about 2 Euros or so) but still, you will not regret it ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198070205606', 'num_games_owned': 4178, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1540091088}
review:
You have exploratory collecting levels, which are pretty fun. 
Then you have auto scrolling levels which seem just so horribly made and out of place.  The timing for the jumps is bizarre resulting in constant deaths, poor checkpoint system, far too many dangers which can result in the reset of the whole level.   These levels absolutely ruin the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198850884410', 'num_games_owned': 7, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 349, 'last_played': 1536944149}
review:
Очень жизнеутверждающая и милая игра от российских разработчиков! Никакого насилия и жестокости. Выполненная в мультяшном стиле и наполненная созидательным геймплеем и смыслом. По сути платформер,но по факту релакс-игра с возможностью исследования и иногда проверки навыков реакции.
И самое приятное,что действие происходит в российском городе. Но продемонстрировано это не навязчиво,а видно лишь в некоторых моментах. Путешествие по игре сопровождается красивой музыкой,которая создаёт должную атмосферу прорыва света сквозь тьму. Игра не требовательна к железу и можно поиграть даже на самом простом компьютере.
p.s после прохождения оставила тёплую,томящуюся в недрах души пост-грусть.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034831097', 'num_games_owned': 1011, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 675, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 675, 'last_played': 1536549079}
review:
TurnOn is an unusual game. It is very much its own thing and players should keep that in mind before getting started. In a loose sense, it is a platformer, but all the action takes place between power lines, and touching the ground forces you back to the most recent checkpoint. As a spark of energy, you go around the levels turning lights on and powering machinery in order to restore order to a city that has been plunged into darkness, and is suffering from all sorts of problems, from failed marriage proposals to all out riots and vandalism.

All of this takes place on a particularly charming world with a cartoon style to it, and it's quite enjoyable to watch the consequences of your actions unfolding as you help citizens go about their lives. Sounds good? Well, it is, only... perpective works quite strangely in this game. Your character has a set size that doesn't change no matter how deep into the environment you are. In this sense, to jump to a power line that is behind you, the character does not really change planes, but rather when you jump up, it gets snapped by the line farther behind and you are able to interact with it.

Now, sometimes the camera follows you in an appropriate manner, but at others it doesn't. It's kind of convoluted, but it works just fine. You shouldn't be discouraged to play it because of this, but like I said, do understand how quirky it is before getting into the game. I saw some complaints on reviews about there being many blind jumps, but I never really felt like there were more than a few of those, and I completed the game 100%, so take that with a grain of salt. A more valid complaint is about the autoscrolling levels, which are not that good, but they are very playable if you are not aiming to collect evevything; if you are... yeah, they kind of suck. Just get over it.

Overall, the experience is so unique that I cannot help but recommend it. There is not exactly anything else like it out there, so on orginality alone it is worth giving a spin.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010597228', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 309, 'playtime_forever': 379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 379, 'last_played': 1533208743}
review:
Netter "Plattformer" auf Stromnetzen, der bis auf wenige frustrierende Level (bzgl. der Errungenschaften) gemütlich zu spielen und nett inszeniert ist.
Die Steuerung ist einfach, WASD für alle Richtungen!
Grafik ist gut gelungen, vor allem die Lichteffekte hamonisieren gut.

Herausforderung bieten die vielen Errungenschaften (82) welche von Secrets finden, bis zum"perfekten" Abschließen der Levels oder bestimmten Beleuchtugnen, welche man anwerfen muss, reicht.

Abwechslung bieten dabei der ein oder andere "Bosskampf" oder Level, bei dem man über das große Stromnetz wie auf Schienen fährt und sich nach oben oder unten bewegen muss.

Fazit: Für "normale" Spieler, Hardcorefans dürften kaum herausgefordert sein!

author: {'steamid': '76561198118741054', 'num_games_owned': 1297, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 147, 'last_played': 1704854483}
review:
Hmmmmmmm......

I like this game. I really do. It has charm out the yinny, an interesting concept, and alright level design. The graphics are nothing to write home about, but graphics are never my first concern. I like that the devs tried their best to not make this just a pretty but boring ol' collectathon.

So it's better than Poncho.  It has that going for it.

But what stops me from recommending this game is what stops me from recommending any game: lack of polish and lack of understanding the audience. 

The collectathon levels and the running levels do not mesh well for me. I like a challenge, but I would not have expected one from this game considering the first few levels are relaxed, enemy-less, Rube Goldberg-infused collectathons (which, if I have not made it clear already, I find to be charming and fun). But there it is; the first few levels are chill and great, but then the running levels kick in. While they aren't impassibly difficult, they, dare I say, ruin the momentum. They stick out and not in a pleasing way. Unless you enjoy being throttled about, they darn near ruin the experience. And they are fairly constant. 

Also, while I again praise the non-running level design and the Rube Goldberg-inspired themes, It's clear that not quite enough testing went into even the middle levels. Jumps that would have worked in previous levels clearly do not in later ones, and that is quite a shame; I want to see later levels, but I won't live in frustration. Maybe I'm just not that dedicated a gamer, but there are loads of other games to play that have good concept and design and actually WORK.

I don't expect miracles; I expect love. There was much apparent love put into this game, but, like a child that peaked at a middle school spelling bee, clearly disappointment set in early and didn't let go.

review: 有五关没有三星，好难受，不过手太残实在是玩不进去了，等以后再来补成就。。。游戏故事简单明了，就是外星带电生物过来给城市发电来了，造型也很简单，可以接受，音乐不错很带动心情，一开始以为一直轻松愉快呢，结果后面有红色的闪电就太考验手残的我了，建议10元一下可以入手玩一玩，控制也很简单，算是打发时间的小游戏，强迫症手残慎入。。。

author: {'steamid': '76561198008554398', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1525644699}
review:
Покупал по скиидке за 69 рублей. 350 слишком кучеряво для неё.
В целом игра неплоха, но положительный отзыв оставить не могу.
Из плюсов:
-Симпотичная графика
-Атмосфера
Из минусов:
-Кривое управление, вернее просто ужасное
-Уровни-раннеры. Это просто пиздец. Я просто полыхал на них. Из-за кривого управления вы заебетесь их проходить
Вроде 2 плюса и два минуса. Но весь положительный опыт этой игры перекрывается как раз ими. Хотелось бы ее рекомендовать к покупке, но увы.

review: Игрушка милая, расслабляющая. Но есть одно большое жирное НО! На уровнях раннерах иногда перестает работать управление, как на геймпаде, так и на клавиатуре. Большая часть смертей в игре случилась как раз по этой причине.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119428162', 'num_games_owned': 645, 'num_reviews': 148, 'playtime_forever': 370, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 370, 'last_played': 1520703299}
review:
TurnOn bağımsız yapım bir macera, platform oyunudur. Maceramız uzaydan gelen bir elektirik formundaki uzaylının şehre düşmesiyle tüm şehrin elektriklerinin kesilmesiyle başlar. Doktor Brainy adındaki bir bilim adamı bu uzaylıyı laboratuarda bulur. Ardından tüm elektriği onarmak için bu uzaylı elektrik akımı olarak elektrik telleri arasında gezinerek şehire elektriği tekrar kazandırmak ister. Bu esnada şehirde çıkan isyan ve karmaşaları önlemeye çalışır. Oyunun senaryosunu ben yaratıcı buldum. Bununla birlikte oyunun müzikleri kulağa hoş geliyor. Grafik ve kullanılan renk paletide göze hitap ediyor. Kısacası hikaye, müzik ve görsel sanat gayet başarılı. Karakter seslendirmeleri daha iyi olabilirdi. Bana bu anlamda yapmacıklık hissi verdi.

2 boyutlu platform oyununda perspektif özellik kullanılarak oyuna derinlik kazandırılmış. Oyunun birçok bölümü 3 boyutlu düşünmeye teşvik ediyor. Ancak bazı bölümlerde perspektif hatalarının olduğunu düşünüyorum. Bunların yanı sıra ufak tefek oyun hataları mevcut. Yinede oyunu fazla etkilemiyor. Kodlama kısmında ve bölüm tasarımlarında eksikliklerin olduğunu söyleyebilirim. Bağımsız yapım bir oyun olduğu için ve ekibin ilk oyunu olduğundan bu tarz şeyler göz ardı edilebilir (Yinede oyunu alacak arkadaşlar bu kısmı göz önünde bulundursun). Oyun kayıt noktaları ise biraz tuhaf. Eğer boşluğa düşlerseniz kayıt noktasına geri yolluyor ve topladığınız nesneleri tekrar toplamanıza gerek kalmıyor. Ancak oyunda bulunan 3 adet yanma hakkımızı harcadığımızda bölüm en başten başlayarak sıfırlanıyor. Bölümü bitirdiğimizde son olarak derecelendirme mevcut. Belli bir skora ulaştıysanız en yüksek seviyede geçmiş oluyorsunuz. Bölümü en baştan oynama seçeneğinide eklemişler. İyi ve kötü yanları olmasına karşın oynanabilicek orta zorlukta bir macera platform oyunu.

Oyun Puanı: 6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198014664157', 'num_games_owned': 1182, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 448, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 443, 'last_played': 1527182228}

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198052298341', 'num_games_owned': 782, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 300, 'last_played': 1518385935}
review:
Czy gry mogą nam przekazać coś więcej niż tylko tępą rozgrywkę nastawioną na rozwalanie i zabijanie wszystkiego wokół siebie? Takie pytanie często muszą sobie zadawać aktywiści głoszący tezę, że za grami często kryje się przemoc w życiu rzeczywistym. Jest to temat na poważną rozmowę, ale nie przy tak barwnej i prostej platformówce jak TurnOn. 

Kilku programistów zakładając małe studyjko zwące się Brainy Studios pokazało, że jak się chce to oczywiście można. Powstanie gry towarzyszyło pewnej akcji, mianowicie "godzinie dla Ziemi" czy coś w tym stylu i miało zwrócić uwagę nam ludziom jak bardzo jesteśmy uzależnieni od elekrtyczności i chodziaż raz na dłuższą chwilę w wielu miejscach na globie wyłączyć wszelkie światło w geście pojednania dla matki Ziemi. Pomysł i cel bardzo zacny, ale z czym się je samą grę. 

Gdy pada światło w całym mieście pewien naukowiec wyrusza z latarką do generatora by sprawdzić co się stało i jak może temu zaradzić. Z mocy generatorów powstaje nasz uroczy, płaski(2D) protagonista, który jest iskierką. Zamiast standardowych plansz z ziemią i platformami mamy tu inny zabieg, bowiem będziemy się poruszać głównie po liniach wysokiego napięcia i innych kablach, ponownie dostarczając prąd do różnorakich punktów miasta.

Tutaj objawia się największy plus produkcji, mianowcie różnorodnośc lokacji. Iskierka pomoże masie ludzi czy to w odegnaniu psa i zaprowadzeniu dziecka do domu przez zapalanie lamp, czy nawet ułatwi zakochanym spotkanie się albo zaaranżuje nawet randkę odwiedzając przy tym takie lokacje jak posterunek policji, market, bibliotekę, park czy wieżowce. Napotkamy też pewne intensywniejsze akcje typu zatrzymanie pędzącego tramwaju czy wyłączenie szalejącego diabelskiego młyna. Na każdym z poziomów zbieramy niebieskie błyskawice i zapalamy rózne urządzenia. Towarzyszy temu wszystkiemu naprawdę niezła muzyka.

A skoro jesteśmy obok muzyki to warto też pochwalić grafikę. Mimo, że do nowych produkcji się  nie umywa, ba jest nawet mocno kanciasta, to i tak jak na indyka dzięki użyciu odpowiedniej gamy barw wygląda to sympatycznie. Sterowanie jest proste jak drut, choć pojawią się tu elementy ucieczki przed laserami i tam gra potrafi być nieco denerwująca, ale to nadal nie jest nic złego. 

To tyle z plusów. Jest też parę minusów. Drugie podejście do pewnych plansz aby je wymaksować potrafiło mnie zmęczyć dość mocno, a mowa tu o kilku poziomach z poruszaniem się po liniach wysokiego napięcia i robienia sobie z nich swoistej trasy zjazdowej. Przy całkiem fajnie rozwiązanych zagadkach przestrzennych(prawie zawsze chodzi o jakiś generator, przydałaby się większa róznorodnośc) te etapy wyglądają blado. Nawet końcowa walka z bosem jest bardzo szybko i łatwa. Zresztą końcowe etapy pokazują, że twórcy chyba zaczynali cierpieć na brak inwencji, gdyż etapy na biurowcach uważam za jedne z nudniejszych przy tym co było wcześniej. Wiąże się to z faktem, iż TurnOn jest krótką grą. Spokojnie da się ją zrobić w kilka godzin, ale może to i lepiej. Przynajmniej nie znudzi się tak szybko jak niektóre inne tytuły.

To by było na tyle z narzekania. Towarzystwo małej iskierki jest fajne, ale radzę kupić grę na promocji(jak ja). Dla tych, którzy maksują na 100 % gry to kilkadziesiąt szybko dostępnych osiągnięć. Dla reszty jako ciekawostka. Być może skłoni nawet do pewnych refleksji. 6+/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197978114813', 'num_games_owned': 2764, 'num_reviews': 911, 'playtime_forever': 702, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 702, 'last_played': 1518169970}
review:
[table]
    [tr]
        [th]推薦程度[/th]
        [th]★★[/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [th]語言[/th]
        [th]官方簡體中文[/th]
    [/tr]
[/table]

[i][h1]點亮城市中每一片黑暗的角落，替人們帶來光明與幸福！[/h1] [/i]

一顆來自外太空的小電球，墜入了一位科學家的實驗室，造成整座城市大停電，玩家將操作小電球，透過自身發電的能力，與科學家一同嘗試替城市恢復電力； 遊戲分為兩個模式，一般模式有簡單的探索與解謎，操作小電球抵達終點即可過關，數個一般模式後，會接一個跑酷模式，這個模式有非常好的配樂，但關卡的難度，讓人不敢恭維...

----------------------------------------------------------

[h1]遊戲特色[/h1]

[i]探索、解謎玩法[/i]

操作小電球遊走在電線、電燈、發電機...等物品上，來點亮燈光，為黑暗的人們帶來光亮。 遊戲中有一些解謎，多數都不難，場景設計很特別，分為多個層次，玩家可以向前或向後來移動，透過不同層面的移動，盡可能點亮這個區域來賺取分數，可以在過關時取得三顆燈泡評價（類似三星評價）。

[b]小電球不只帶來光明，也到處製造幸福～。[/b]
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1295765782

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1295765910

[h1]遊戲問題[/h1]

[i]跑酷關卡過於困難[/i]

跑酷關卡的配樂相當出色，但關卡設計過於刁鑽，全程幾乎沒有什麼容錯的空間，以一款休閒、探索為核心玩法的遊戲來說，玩家追求的就是輕鬆玩，結果塞進這樣一個要求反應、操作的跑酷玩法，和遊戲本身相當格格不入；而且難度會越來越難，後面兩個跑酷，我大概重試了20～30次以上，才通關...根本不奢望拿到三顆燈泡 Orz。

[b]當我遇到後面的跑酷關卡，這關難度就只是還好而以...[/b]
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1295594442

[h1]優點：[/h1]
[olist]
    [*] 漂亮的美術。
    [*] 出色的音樂，電車跑酷那關的「Run away」超好聽～
    [*] 不一樣的探索設計。
[/olist]

[h1]缺點：[/h1]
[olist]
    [*] 跑酷關卡的難度，嚴重破壞了遊戲體驗。
[/olist]

[h1]結論：看似輕鬆休閒，但其實一點都不休閒的小品。[/h1]

TurnOn 在多數的遊玩時間裡，玩起來很輕鬆、愜意，但只要一進入跑酷關卡，就需要打起12分精神，注意跑道變化，並且會不斷的重試、重試，再重試；此外遊戲的後期關卡，會突然變成有難度的動作遊戲，加入了限時、閃躲的元素。

而這幾點，都讓 TurnOn 不是一款單純的休閒遊戲，因此如果只想體驗輕鬆休閒的小品，個人會不建議你遊玩 TurnOn。

[quote] 喜歡我的評論嗎？歡迎參觀我的[url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/31470152/] 遊戲私房菜[/url]  觀看其他評論！[/quote]
[quote] 也歡迎加入我的 [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/0-roll-king] ACE鑑賞家群組 [/url] 發現更多的中文評論！[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198045630846', 'num_games_owned': 1476, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 758, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 751, 'last_played': 1515802300}
review:
Enjoyable leisurely adventure, with nice fluid controls.

 There are many stages and most of them adhere to the leisurely style, but there are four (IIRC) stages (Suburbs, Mad Tram, Get out of here, and  Lifts) that are rapid stages under pressure. The first three are like speedrunner levels, while the last is made hectic by having a "wall of death" following you, forcing you to make your maneuvers quickly.

 Some people feel these levels are out of place in the game and wish they were removed. If you're just looking to get through the speedrunner levels to continue on with the game, just [spoiler]ignore the collectible blue sparks (and green bolts unless you need one), and concentrate on staying on a live wire and avoiding the red bolts.[/spoiler]. If you're trying to get the achievement for these levels, [spoiler]take full advantage of the fact you're not penalized for falling off the wires. Jump off intentionally to redo an area where you missed some sparks. Jump off before the half way check point to keep doing the first half, and off before the finish to keep doing the 2nd half. Only the ones you missed are there on redo runs[/spoiler]

7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198257988868', 'num_games_owned': 3573, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 1294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1294, 'last_played': 1508823587}
review:
[h1]这是一个被红色闪电毁掉的佳作[/h1]

================================
全成就达成更新：好玩是好玩，就是太难了，做了好几天的成就orz
================================
[h1]开灯[/h1]
[h1]TurnOn评测[/h1]

大家好我是少年粥。
这款游戏在我关注到的时候已经进了包，制作精良，关卡丰富，音乐效果更是incredible。
但是我为什么要给一个差评？题目已经写了，这是一个被红色闪电毁掉的游戏。

[h1] 游戏特点[/h1]
玩家作为研究所点亮城市光明的电球儿，穿梭在电缆电线中。游戏最大的特点是忽略了真实空间中的前后距离感，可以从很远处高处的电缆上，跳到近处低处的电缆上，仅受重力限制。点亮灯的一路上，你会帮助到很多镇子里的人们，剧情有趣；可以点亮暗处的灯泡或是打开机器获得分数，收集感满满。

[h1] 游戏玩法[/h1]
操纵电球儿！让它到达断电镇子的每一处！

[h1] 游戏吐槽[/h1]
好了，那么说完了游戏的优点，就应该说一些吐槽了。
这是一个被红色闪电毁掉的游戏。
首先说明一下，游戏中的绿色代表电球生命，蓝色代表电和电线，而红色代表着电球失去生命。
大多数时候，红色在游戏中是不存在的。所以大多数时候，这个游戏内容丰富、有趣。
而最初红色闪电开始虐我，是在一次城际电缆穿梭之旅。
在你想要跳跃电缆之间的缝隙时，游戏的作者把一个红色闪电，正正正好好好放在你会落下的地方。
你们说可以靠技巧躲避，那么好，我为了过那一关，大概玩了一个多小时。
要知道如果你付出的努力，得不到价值实现，也就是过不了关，那种感受有多难受。
然而那一次我忍下来了，因为那一关的背景音乐特别好听！！！
接着，今天好不容易有时间重新玩一次turnon，刚玩了两关，又出现了一关，
红色闪电会限制我的行动时间，而我打一次到上面需要好几分钟，现在已经失败了十几次了。
忍无可忍我要来发泄我的情绪。
这么一个好游戏竟然因为这样的关卡安排而变得非常非常非常非常难过。
本来是不想给这个差评的，实在是忍无可忍。
看了一些评测，也不是我一个人觉得难。
这就是我给出差评的原因。

[h1] 购买建议[/h1]
可以直接购买indiegala的慈善包：Hump Day #33

[h1] 粥粥评分[/h1]
画面：★★★☆☆
音效：★★★★★
情怀：★★★★☆
游戏性：★★★☆☆
性价比：★★★★★（入包价，值）

author: {'steamid': '76561198100378233', 'num_games_owned': 274, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1506881557}
review:
终于通关了，一看时间才4小时，但我觉得像是玩了10多个小时一样，因为好多关卡又臭又长，完全是无意义的重复设计。
买这个游戏的时候我看介绍，感觉主题比较新颖有创意，才买来玩，但一玩才知道实际玩法真的无聊到爆炸啊，玩了这么多关，其实干的事情都特么一样。
还有那个恶心死人的跑酷关卡，看其他人差评基本上都提到了这一点。重复的问题就拿最后一大关来说，就是爬楼，不停爬楼，明明一个楼，一关就能搞定的事，它给你设计几座楼，好几关。
最后的BOSS关卡我就更是摸不着头脑，满天的红闪电和绿闪电飞，我乱跳，就碰了一下BOSS直升机，这关卡就特么过了，我很不解。
剧情也是毫无吸引力，而且经历了这么多无聊的关卡，再有意思的剧情我也无力投入了（何况它真的没有），【以下剧透，我就不打码了，反正没人会在意这游戏的剧情】，而且我没搞懂的是为什么最后电力小精灵完成使命，离开地球，居民们又把家里的电关了，挥手向它告别，人家来不就是让你们重新通电的吗。



总结：这游戏设计上的缺点挺致命，完全能盖住它的那些小小的优点，另：简体中文在这个游戏上可以说没啥优势，又没对白，就菜单几个单词，还是机翻，但有简中态度还是值得鼓励。

author: {'steamid': '76561198076665762', 'num_games_owned': 1343, 'num_reviews': 123, 'playtime_forever': 251, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 251, 'last_played': 1502304730}
review:
Unique platformer with cute graphics. You take role of alien electric wisp trying to help with electricity problems on Earth.

PROS:
- cute quirky 3D graphics
- good level design with some tricky places, but all is solvable
- pleasant music
- original idea
- diversity of locations

MEH:
- some levels are somewhat repetitive - there is material for 25 levels and they made 32 levels
- sometimes the levels are too easy
- the only thing you control is movement (up, down, left, right), there are no action buttons whatsoever

CONS:
- the "cut scene" graphics are 2D drawings which are somewhat ugly

The game was fun, but it's rather casual.

My rating:
GAMEPLAY 7/10
GRAPHICS 8/10
AUDIO 7/10
STORY 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198001478346', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 314, 'last_played': 1500799468}
review:
A cute, rather unique puzzle platformer. The game would be absolutely great, if not for the occasional runner levels, which fall flat for several reasons.

For one thing, the runner sections don't fit the pace of the rest of the game, which encourages exploration and moving back and forth. Add to this frustratingly placed and occasionally glitchy savepoints, the very precise movements and foresight required for good scores, and the occasional buggy invisible platform, and the runner levels bring a very annoying difficulty spike at the end of each section.

In general, the game is good, just be prepared for the occasional period of frustration.

author: {'steamid': '76561198286724621', 'num_games_owned': 2514, 'num_reviews': 453, 'playtime_forever': 665, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 665, 'last_played': 1500635503}
review:
[h1]{游戏内容}[/h1]
电力之城停电了[strike]名字立的flag[/strike]，走哪儿哪通电的电星人在30个地图忙活一晚来恢复全市供电。
电星人在小雨、暴雨、打雷、下雪等恶劣天气辛苦[strike]收集三灯[/strike]工作，为该城市人民解决了洗澡没热水等民生问题，恢复了工业用电，迅速在其成为重特大事故之前解决了摩天轮失控事件，以全程跟进有轨校车为首体现了对教育的重视，还会协助青年风花雪月。
当代活雷锋，我辈之楷模！电力之城选市长请投电星人一票！
=================================
[h1]{优点}[/h1]
+背景绚丽
+丰富的bgm，与每关主题吻合，电线跑酷的几关甚至能踩节拍跳跃
+绝大部份关卡过关难度适中，且有一定趣味性
+点亮灯超有成就感！
=================================
[h1]{缺点}[/h1]
-电线跑酷的几关难度过高
-下暴雨、闪电关卡的音乐致郁
=================================
[h1]{感想}[/h1]
执念全成就的朋友如果手残需要一定的受虐耐受能力。该游戏可能更适合手柄玩。
通关其实不用这么久。电线跑酷的几关（下小雨、下雷雨、校车、摩天轮）还有倒数第二关直升飞机失控那关三灯太难太难了，刷到怀疑人生。有三个收集成就去找了论坛上俄语攻略才搞定QAQ

author: {'steamid': '76561198030788488', 'num_games_owned': 747, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 606, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 606, 'last_played': 1498716015}
review:
[h1]TurnOn[/h1]
...is a puzzle platformer. As a little alien who crash-lands on Earth causing a blackout, you must run on the power lines to restore electricity to Electro City, helping people along the way.

[h1]⚙ [u]Game Description & Mechanics[/u] ⚙[/h1]
You go from one neighborhood to another, travelling on electrical wires and other conductive surfaces, and jumping from one to the other. You supply power to lights, generators and other electrical equipment by touching them. As you seek them out throughout each level, you also collect sparks of lightning bolts along the way.

There are also musical segments, where you travel on high-tension wires at high speed, jumping from one wire to another to avoid obstacles and pits, using the music and following its beat to time your jumps and drops.

Falling off wires will throw you back to your last save points to continue where you left off, while red sparks will kill you after a few hits. In some levels, red sparks corrupted some objects that will chase you around.

[h1]☺ [u]What I enjoyed[/u] ☺[/h1]
While the platforming is simple enough, and patience will be all you need to find every spark and secret passages before moving to the following levels, the musical segments are much harder, at least if you care about getting a 3-lamp score at each level.

A game probably built with a younger audience in mind, it is very colorful, almost whimsical, it's unlikely that you'll mind the low resolutions and very simple animations. Each level has a basic but implied story, from lighting the path home of a little girl, you helping to lovers meet halfway, or assisting the cops calm down a riot. The gorgeous sundown and charming music will appease to many.

[h1]☹ [u]What bothered me[/u] ☹[/h1]
Gameplay is tied, no matter how zoomed in or out the camera is. This means that jumping about an inch high "on screen" sometimes results in multiple yards leaps to a line in the foreground or background because the current camera angle shows it an inch away. This is a very unreliable, very inconsistent mechanic for a sidescrolling platformer.

The game is definitely way too easy at times, allowing unlimited retries. It's pretty easy to find all hidden sparks, so you probably won't be replaying it again to get a better score. But then come the music segments with a huge difficulty spike to the 3-lamp score, which means you might be playing over and over the same level until you get frustrated, or memorize the entire level.

[h1][b]My Verdict[/b]: ★★★☆☆ - [i]"It's up to you."[/i][/h1]

This game has its charm, done by a tiny development team. While I wouldn't recommend it to hardcore gamers, [i]TurnOn[/i] is a nice little game for children or casual gamers, the only audience I will actually suggest this to.

—————————————————————————
[i][b]This was just my opinion.[/b]

If you found this review helpful, please consider giving it a thumbs up, and feel free to check out more of my (purely opinionated) [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/CJsOpinions/]reviews[/url].[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198043938050', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1498516893}
review: nice casual game  to play if you dont want something too challenging and just want to relax. I like the art style and the music is nice. My only real complaint about the game, even though its a pretty small one more of a pet peeve really. The world is rendered as a sidescroller where you move between the foreground and background to give you a sense of 3d depth. My only issue with that is your character does not change size to keep that illusion going, I.E. shrinking to portray moving further away or getting larger to move closer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058695291', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1494945912}
review:
At first glance I wasn't sure what to make of this game. You go from place to place in this light platformer, well turning on ... lights. It sounds a bit strange at first as you're an alien ball of electricity from what I can guess trying to find your way back home. What ensues is a grand adventure through the city witnessing the chaos that happens to the mundane when the lights go out. Every few levels tells a bit of story about what you have to do and who you're helping but story elements while touching at points are very light and non-consequential to gameplay. 

Gameplay itself is a mixture of casual platformer and runner type missions. Each self contained without overall impact on each other. Now I might be a bit of a sucker for the simple stuff but I found myself genuinely enjoying my time spent in this game. There is no hardcore challenge to be had. The visuals and music brings it all together to make the experience a solid, well done and not boring. This is something I'd play if I wanted a little fun but didn't want the monotony or hardcore challenge that came with other games of the genre.

The music in this game is beautiful, and is necessary considering there's no dialogue or text moving along the story but when I'm scaling the heights of a building and the piano concerto starts to pick up I understand the urgency and pressure behind my ascent. Or during the slightly more urgent runner levels the uptempo beat that gives you the sense of urgency. In all I would recommend this game for anyone wanting a casual time killer but come in with low expectations. It's not a revolutionary game but what it does it does it well.

author: {'steamid': '76561198221206804', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 209, 'playtime_forever': 128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 128, 'last_played': 1496264266}
review:
簡単だ……って、レビューが多いですが、
ぼくには難しかった。
ただ、アクションが難しいとかではなく、
ゴールが見えないことが難しかった。

ゴールが見えない……これはもう言葉どおりで、
ぜんぶ電気を付けたけど、
ステージクリアには至らない……ってこと。

たしかに、スカッとする演出はあるにはあるけど、
だったらこんな変なところを難しくせず、
シンプルにスカッとさせてほしかった。

ただ、褒めている方たちのプレイ時間がほとんど３時間程度を見れば、
まあそういう程度の評価なんだなあと思う。
自分は薦められない。

author: {'steamid': '76561198156058850', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 467, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 467, 'last_played': 1494498613}
review:
TurnOn è un'avvetura platform nel quale dovrete guidare una "sfera energetica aliena" per riportare l'ordine ad Electrocity.

La maggior parte dei livelli sono pura esplorazione, sottoforma di platform. Nonostante sembri un'accostamento particolare, i due generi sono fusi alla perfezione.
In questi livelli avrete diversi obiettivi, fermare rivolte, salvare persone... sempre saltando da un filo della corrente all'altro, attivando generatori, lampioni, insegne.
Tutto questo vi porta attraverso l'avventura di TurnOn (la sfera di energia), il cui obiettivo principale è quello di tornare a casa, sul suo pianeta.

Oltre ai livelli di esplorazione ci sono alcuni "intermezzi" musicali che trasformano il gioco in un "runner ritmico" nel quale dovrete solamente saltare o scendere dalle linee per arrivare alla fine del livello.

Inoltre ci sono due o tre "livelli boss" in cui dovrete, sempre con la stessa meccanica dei fili di corrente, sconfiggere certi nemici, colpendoli nei punti indicati mentre saltate di qua e di là.

[spoiler]L'avventura termina dopo aver riportato l'elettricità ovunque. Fatto ciò, lo scienziato coprotagonista, vi porterà all'ultimo livello, che in realtà non è altro che un "livello bonus" senza particolari difficoltà, nel quale finalmente partirete con un'astronave diretta nello spazio.[/spoiler]

Il gioco è di buonissima fattura [i](specie se consideriamo che è prodotto da un piccolo team indie di quattro persone!)[/i].
I livelli di esplorazione rasentano la perfezione. Bellissimo l'effetto "2D/3D" che crea profondità nei livelli d'esplorazione (in pratica, potete saltare e scendere su fili che si trovano in basso o in alto, anche se questi sono dal punto di vista del giocatore più vicino o più lontano).

I livelli runner sono un po' rivedibili. A volte le linee non sono così precise, inoltre non si capisce dove siano i checkpoint, per il resto nessun problema.

Gli ambienti sono fantastici e molto dettagliati e lo si capisce già dai primi livelli.
La colonna sonora è una delle migliori che abbia mai sentito. Non snoia, anzi, è godibilissima e azzeccatissima!

Achievement tutti assolutamente fattibili, unico problema, è capire a volte dove essi vadano fatti.

Nel complesso l'esperienza di gioco è stata fanastica, per cui non posso far altro che consigliarvi assolutamente questo titolo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198276941636', 'num_games_owned': 340, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 297, 'last_played': 1611761237}
review:
我自己給的標籤是

 #好評原聲帶 #紓壓 #冒險 #可愛 #色彩鮮豔

歷史最低價是80%off  79元 個人覺得很值得


一、故事背景

  「啪！」 整個世界突然斷電了，陷入一片黑暗與恐慌之中，發電廠發生意外之後

  只有唯一的火花倖存下來，就是科學家的小寵物(?) 電電(我自己取的XD)

  http://imgur.com/a/pzlrV
  科學家小心翼翼的把電電抱上去線路上面 但是不會被電到(?)

  唯一的星星之火，背負著要點亮整個城市的責任，讓市民們回到以前的生活


二、遊戲介面

  控制方面非常的簡單，只有方向鍵，藉由在各電線與電燈之間跳躍，解決市民們的問題

  路上會有三種顏色的閃電，藍色是分數，綠色是+1生命(生命最大為3)，紅色則是-1生命

  生命扣完會從頭開始

  目前沒有繁體中文，只有簡體，但劇情情上面，是用美式漫畫風格傳達

  所以沒有語言的問題

  http://imgur.com/a/mvPQ9
  等等要和導亂的空拍機大戰一場囉


三、遊戲特色

  1.關卡不難，死掉幾次一定會過關的

  2.關卡有兩種，故事解謎 & 跑酷， 在商店網站上面都可以看到

    我最喜歡的是跑酷的關卡，因為音樂很舒壓XD

    但如果讓 電電 跳躍的有節拍的話，會更好 (那樣的話不就是音樂遊戲嗎XD)

    https://youtu.be/mzHdIxlLfWw  (結果還是死一次了OTZ)



  3. 遊戲有點假3D設定，移動的時候前景跟後景捲動速度不同，我們的電電沒有

    所以可以從前景的電線很不科學的跳到後景的電線
    http://imgur.com/uJTsPMb

   個人覺得這設定蠻有趣的

四、心得

這是個適合在悠閒的下午時光遊玩的遊戲，遊戲時數大概3~4小時，重玩性不高

除非想解成就，如果可以的話希望他們增加跑酷關卡，一邊聽音樂一邊跑酷，

超愜意的。 79元我覺得是很值得的一款遊戲

http://imgur.com/a/secuF
其他遊戲畫面

author: {'steamid': '76561198093666838', 'num_games_owned': 560, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 222, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 222, 'last_played': 1491882114}
review:
[h1]As an alien creature, you make your way through a world cloaked in darkness, lighting it up as you go through this incredibly colorful and detailed platformer without platforms.[/h1]

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
You play as an alien lifeform that needs to light up a dark town via puzzles. There aren’t any platforms per se, but you do travel through the power lines, transformers, etc. There’s a lot of exploration and trinkets to pick up in hidden areas as well. If you land on the ground, you will die and will start at a checkpoint. Losing lives in the middle of a level sends you back to the beginning.

There isn’t any dialogue. Instead, the story is purely visual and everything is told through what you see and what you don’t. The cutscenes resemble a graphic novel and you as the player can put the pieces together as the story unfolds.

The levels vary; some will be on-the-rails and you’ll be required to dodge enemies and obstacles as you’re auto-propelled and then there are the freeroam levels where you can freely move and explore at your leisure.

There are various things to collect ranging from lightning bolts to hidden objects found throughout the level. Collecting enough lightning bolts at the end of the level will grant you a better score. Turning on all the lights and hitting switch boxes are the key to getting a high score. Pay close attention, a lot of the utility poles have lamps that will give you points when you turn them on too.

The puzzles have you figuring out how to turn something on, helping someone get somewhere by lighting their way, or turning on a series of lights for someone that open up a new path for you to explore.

The end of each level has a scorecard and 3 lightbulbs. Light up all three when you get a higher score. The 3 buttons on the bottom are Replay, Map, and Next level. So, if you didn’t get all the bolts or didn’t light up all 3 lightbulbs, you can choose to go back through the level.

[h1]Controls[/h1]
I used an Xbox 360 controller for this, but you can also use a keyboard. Left/Right you can use the left thumbstick, on the keyboard it’s A or D. Jumping up is A or W on the keyboard and jumping Down is B or S on the keyboard. There will be moments where you need to time your jumps just right in order to get to certain areas or reach a secret collectible.

[h1]Graphics/Music[/h1]
The entire story is visual, so the visuals here are fantastic. The story cutscenes are told in sort of a graphic novel style panels. The music is pretty chill and reflect the mood or action in each level. All the sounds fit perfectly and don’t take you away from the experience.

[h1]Overall[/h1]
I highly recommend TurnOn, BUT I would wait until it’s on sale or found in a bundle. At it’s current price of $14.99, that’s a pretty steep price for about 4-5 hours of gameplay. Personally, I feel that this should be in the ballpark of around $5 for the limited amount of gameplay if you aren’t a completionist.

Overall, the visual story coupled with the intuitive gameplay where the entire level becomes your playing field makes for a very casual game. Having to light up the city becomes fun and a challenge where you’re curious as to what other secrets or lights you can turn on to rack up the highest score. TurnOn by Brainy Studios is in the Steam store, link in the description.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055725979', 'num_games_owned': 1326, 'num_reviews': 262, 'playtime_forever': 669, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 669, 'last_played': 1482316914}
review:
Sobre un control de personaje plano se aplica un escenario poligonal y cuadrangular para establecer una profundidad de campo que pueda desviar y ampliar sus posibilidades jugables hacia la tercera dimensión de la plataforma o escenario, con mecánica fluida.
La fórmula es muy singular hacia su presentación artística y demuestra ser notoria, no teniendo conflictos en lo que a su base cuadrangular se refiere: admite cualquier cosa que se pueda imaginar dentro de su concepto.

El juego aprovecha bien todo su potencial, distribuyendo casi su completa jugabilidad hacia un atmosférico y visual escenario explorativo. Sus plataformas y detalle se funden para potenciar su jugabilidad explorativa que se plantea como un recorrido localizativo. Extremadamente recomendado.

Aparte de esta jugabilidad o niveles muy divertidos nos vamos a encontrar con otro tipo de niveles en mucha menos cantidad que serán de reflejos, en donde la jugabilidad cambiará radicalmente a esquivar obstáculos en un pista de caminos paralelos con un scroll rapidísimo que puede complicarnos el terminar el juego.

author: {'steamid': '76561198257421012', 'num_games_owned': 114, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1482925520}
review:
[h1]Bewertung zu TurnOn[/h1]

Ich habe das Spiel schon öfters mal gespielt und sage über das Spiel das es sehr gut ist.

Ich nennen zuerst die negativen Punkte, diese sind:

- [b]Der Preis.[/b] Das Spiel ist gut, aber ich finde 15€ zu viel für das Spiel. Ich empfehle es einfach bei einem Sale zu kaufen, wo
   es dann vielleicht dann nur 10€ kostet.
- Der nächste Punkt wäre das es in manch einem [b]Level stellen[/b] gibt [b]wo man nicht[/b] ohne Internet oder langer suche [b]weiter  
   kommt[/b].

Jetzt kommen die positiven Punkte, diese sind:

- Das Spiel ist [b]sehr gut gestaltet[/b] und hat eine sehr gute Grafik.
- Man merkt es wurde [b]mit Freude erstellt[/b] und nicht einfach nur um Geld zu machen.
- Wenn man [b]nicht einen sehr guten Rechner/Laptop[/b] hat läuft das Spiel [b]trotzdem sehr flüssig[/b] und gut.
- Es hat [b]mehrere Level[/b], für die man mal auch etwas länger brauchen kann.

Fazit:
 Meiner Meinung [spoiler]einen Kauf wert, da man sehr viel Spaß hat und haben wird.[/spoiler] 
 Also Kauft es und bildet eure eigene Meinung zum Spiel. (gehe mit dem Zeiger über das Schwarze um Text zu lesen)


Bitte Kommentar da lassen habe mir vie mühe gegeben.

author: {'steamid': '76561198358402484', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1489113186}

author: {'steamid': '76561198269493329', 'num_games_owned': 2735, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 468, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 468, 'last_played': 1488900632}
review:
[b]休閒小品遊戲[/b]

[h1]劇情[/h1]
[spoiler]一場意外，讓各地都壟罩在漆黑之中。
僅存的小電球與博士為了讓世界再次被照亮，便開始展開冒險。
在沒有燈光的世界，所有事情似乎都變得那麼可怕。
混亂的社會、失色的約會、孤單、寂寞、害怕。

於是從發電機開始，路燈一盞一盞被點亮。
守秩序的市民、甜蜜的戀愛、家的溫暖與安全感。

每一盞燈都再次被開啟，世界又重見了光亮。
但人們卻又熄滅了燈，只為了送走最後一束火花。

劇情雖稍短，但內容很溫馨，而最後一幕有被感動到。[/spoiler]

[h1]畫面[/h1]
本作在場景細節的製作非常細膩(例如: 看板廣告、街景、牆壁、告示牌)，讓遊戲畫面即便是Q版玩具風格，卻仍然具有真實感。
在一些火光特效與點亮燈光的動畫做得很舒服流暢，從選單畫面就可以看出精細程度與其畫風的風格特色。

[h1]音樂[/h1]
本作的音樂除了對於影響氣氛之外，有時甚至可以搭配遊戲的節奏來遊玩。
因為多屬抒情的鋼琴演奏類，我非常意外本作竟然沒有出原聲帶，因為每一首的旋律都相當優美、餘音繞樑。
音樂節奏的快慢抓得非常適當，伴隨著進行中的遊戲，使遊玩之餘更添一種悠閒的感覺。

[h1]操作[/h1]
操作簡單，只需要使用鍵盤方向鍵即可。
不同的地圖有時會搭配劇情與音樂，使操作的感覺忽快忽慢，而不只是單一的速度與反應。

[h1]遊戲性[/h1]
雖然在各項表現都有優秀之處，但是遊戲性就真的相當普通。
真要講，也只能說「就是那樣」。

遊戲大致上可以分成兩種玩法:
配合劇情完成任務、配合音樂與反應結合

雖然說遊戲性相當普通，但是需要配合音樂節奏來進行的關卡讓我很喜歡。
本作還有一項比較特別的視覺錯覺玩法，角色可以在看似接近卻遙遠的兩條電線，透過視覺錯覺的方式進行移動，讓原本必須走一大段路才能到的地點瞬間抵達，這種特殊移動方式在一般動作遊戲中是比較少見的。

[h1]整體6/10[/h1]
綜觀來說，這是一款小品佳作，但是在遊戲方式的多樣性可以再更豐富一點，不然音樂優美、畫面舒服、卻只有普通的遊戲性，反而容易催眠玩家。

[h1]優點[/h1]
-利用畫面的景深，延伸出視覺錯覺的玩法相當特別
-音樂旋律不絕於耳

[h1]缺點[/h1]
-遊戲性稍微低了點

--------------------------------------------
[h1]簡評:[/h1]
如果只是無聊想玩玩什麼遊戲，可以試著考慮這款。但是劇情不長、遊戲性不高、難度也不高，雖然配合音樂節奏與錯覺的遊戲方式很特別，但也「就是那樣」，而且有些關卡帶給我的樂趣不高，使我一度受到催眠。[/b]

[quote]如果喜歡我的評論風格，可以關注[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/31503978-AdventureInGame/]
AdventureInGame[/url]來獲得更多遊戲評論。[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198098358558', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1488563660}
review:
TurnOn невероятная игра. Ламповая и необчычная. Маленький щидевр я бы даже сказал. Несмотря на то что она довольно короткая и не особо сложная, она трогает в первую очередь другим. Визуальный ряд выглядит средне, но в своем стиле. Отдельно хочеться сказать об очень красивых саунтреках, который делает настроение каждом эпизоду игры. Я бы с удовольствием скачал его отдельно и слушал долго и с удовольствием.
Игра стоит того что бы ее купить и пройти. Ради всех достижений можно пройти ее не один раз, и все равно получать долгое время все те же приятные ощущения. Не скажу что действующая сейчас сумма ей подходит, ибо она давольно высока. Возможно стоит подождать скидки хотя бы в 25%. Но все же игра полностью может себя оккупить, для ценителей подобного жанра.
Не хочу ставить оценк в виде баллов, просто скажу что это чудесная игра. Спасибо соотечествиникам, которые смогли создать эту прекрасную уютную игру. Прекрасные разработчики.

author: {'steamid': '76561198277957436', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1471161057}

author: {'steamid': '76561198322138683', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 697, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 435, 'last_played': 1545642162}
review:
Turn On 开灯
你们问我游戏怎么样，我要是回答“无可奉告”，但是你们又不高兴
游戏新人一定要看看评测，不能看了宣传短片，预览图就+1‘，懂不懂啊
我告诉你们，解谜非常有意思，动起脑筋来想，乐趣非凡
跑酷令人恶心，跳不动，上不了司机的车，无论是叉车还是汽车，有轨电车，都要抓住机会啊，还是要提高W键的灵活应变
解谜不错，跑酷要命
还有存档点不够多
电机离得那么远，每回在原地循环，这让人很暴躁
还有我一个外星人，思想觉悟这么高，是不是有种钦定的感觉
地球人，还要学习一个
无人机啊，我是不知道怎么打他
就是观察上面的红色闪电标记啊，注意个数
一定要耐心
不过总的来说，看了短片就够了，精华的部分已经放完了
不必自己来打的。

author: {'steamid': '76561197974404382', 'num_games_owned': 6525, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1487821328}
review:
Um jogo bonito, com uma trilha sonora invejável, com o objetivo de trazer luz para toda a população saltando sobre os fios de energia, postes, acendendo lampadas, luminárias, ligando aparelhos e entre outras coisas. Existe um pouco de "puzzle" em alguns pontos mas de forma bem trivial, deixando o jogo um pouco menos cansativo.

É um jogo de plataforma 2D e com uma ideia até que inovadora e objetivos diferentes a casa fase. Não existe uma história muito elaborada, mas a diversão garante algumas horas de jogo.

Sua arte e iluminação torna o jogo bem agradável de se jogar e, como a interação é simples e bem prática, o jogo serve para qualquer público, inclusive o infantil.

Existem várias fases, cada uma com seu objetivos em específico como: afastar os bandidos das casas acendendo luzes, ligar toda iluminação do super mercado, abrindo portas, acendendo luzes e tudo envolvendo a energia. Têm também as fases do tipo runner também, em que você corre através dos fios, desviando dos obstáculos e coletando os raios de energia.

Um jogo que é um pouco mais que um passatempo, bem relaxante com as músicas bem feitas em que o desafio fica a critério do jogador, que seria completar todas as conquistas e pegar todos os itens das fases, acendendo e colocando energia em tudo que é possível. Vale apena adquirir numa promoção!

Prós
+Arte
+Trilha Sonora
+Diversão
+Envolvimento
+Desafios

Contra
-Preço Inicial
-História fraca
-Curto (~5 horas)

Nota Xepa: 8.2

author: {'steamid': '76561198034931041', 'num_games_owned': 844, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1487772786}

author: {'steamid': '76561197963897896', 'num_games_owned': 963, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 498, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 498, 'last_played': 1487804642}
review:
My first impression of this game was good.  It has a nice art style and the idea of repowering the city by jumping from electrical platform to electrical platform and reaching collectibles and different goals seemed cool to me.  Especially the way the story is told appeals to me.  In one level you're powering homes to get the lights on in order to scare away burglars attempting to get inside.  In another level, you're bringing a man and a woman together for their date by turning on traffic lights to make it safe to cross streets, getting a water pump running to spray malicious thugs, and so on.  In this way, the game is great.  The leisurely way you roam the levels and interact with things to see the effect you have on them and watch a small story unfold - it's relaxing and fun.

And then there's the reason I give this game a thumbs down.  There are about 6 levels that are "runner" levels.  You are automatically moving forward along power lines and all you can do is jump up or down them.  These levels can be immensely frustrating depending on how you play them.  I, for instance, really want to get everything and achieve a high score.  To do that, you need to get almost every collectible in the stage.  Make mistakes, and you get to start the level over - the checkpoints are few and far between.  Imagine playing DDR and you make three mistakes and it automatically starts you off at the beginning of the song again.  The music in this game is nice, but you start to hate it when you hear it over and over again fifty times.  

Of course, you don't have to try to collect everything and get a high score.  You can just run through these levels casually.  However, if you're doing that, they're too easy and there's not much to do.  You press W a few times, you press S a few times and you're done.  Unlike the normal levels, there's no story, no exploration in these levels.  If you're not trying to collect everything, these levels serve no purpose.  And if you are collecting everything, they're pure frustration.  The camera is way too zoomed in, you can't see far enough ahead of you and often cannot react to things immediately enough to accomplish anything.  I don't feel the controls are as responsive as I'd like, either, though this may just be my perception - I press W at times and it doesn't jump.  The level design of these runner levels have caused the community as a whole to just exploit them.  If you've reached a checkpoint, your collectibles are saved if you die from falling, so you keep dying on purpose over and over again to collect as many as you can manage before completing the level.  This just proves bad level design.  I feel they were only added to give the game a false sense of challenge.  They don't seem to fit the overall mood of the rest of the game - one of exploration and interaction within a beautiful world.

With the runner levels, I must give this game a thumbs down.  They are either too hard or too easy, depending on your playstyle, and simply don't fit with the rest of the narrative or gameplay.  Otherwise, this game would get a thumbs up.  Regardless, it's a worthy game to play casually if you can get it really cheap on sale.  The game takes less than 5 hours to complete.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983066158', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 806, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 800, 'last_played': 1490874060}

author: {'steamid': '76561198283259191', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 246, 'last_played': 1514531104}
review:
三条命没有就重新来的设定实在是太恶心了，来自一个在摩天轮卡了很久的人的愤怒，不知是不是自己太手残
对跑酷关卡的难度没什么太大意见，但是摩天轮那里实在是糟心
音乐和设计都很棒，所以虽然玩得很生气，还是要给好评

author: {'steamid': '76561198051118754', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 29, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1487169217}
review:
游戏的3C处理很粗糙，角色跳跃行走的行为不流畅，角色缺乏表现力。

游戏核心玩法就是Platformer，没有什么创新，游戏的关卡设计在玩法层面单调乏味，虽然添加了各种eye candy（背景环境，点亮各类物品），但换汤不换药，反而喧宾夺主，更加衬托玩法的乏味。

男性博士角色极度缺乏想象力和新意，为这样一个角色服务感觉老套而没有意义。

author: {'steamid': '76561198095868469', 'num_games_owned': 471, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 774, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1594145015}
review:
Okay, 3 years after first review, after finally beating game, I'll switch it from NO to YES.
Game looks really cute and rather promising. Mostly it's relaxing puzzle platformer. Calm, enjoyable, beautiful. 
But several runner levels are total disaster. They have no sense and are absolutely opposite to whole game - too fast, too hard, too repetitive. There are too less checkpoints and lives in them, so be prepared to hate and repeat them again and again and again... 
And after finally beating any runner - you''ll be rewarded with few more relaxing levels. And then runner again...
Totally game isn't bad. It could be much better without runner levels. But still it is rather good, unusual and enjoyable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000167042', 'num_games_owned': 563, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1486381725}
review:
TurnOn Est un charmant et relaxant petit jeu de plateforme avec quelques puzzles.
J'adore vraiment les graphismes qui en font son charme.

Vous êtes dans l'obscutiré et incarnez une petite boule d'énergie que vous devrez diriger à travers les fils électriques en ramassant de petites éclaires d'électricité afin d'alimenter certaines machines et lumières afin de compléter chacun des parcours.

Le jeu est,apparement,un peu court.Je vous suggère donc de l'acheter en spécial.Si vous aimez ce genre de jeu,vous allez sans doute aimer celui ci.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018061433', 'num_games_owned': 1510, 'num_reviews': 1588, 'playtime_forever': 279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 279, 'last_played': 1485997252}
review:
Wir steuern lebendiger, elektrischer Funke und müssen eine ganze Stadt und ihre Bereiche wieder mit Strom versorgen. Wunderschöne Spielwelt und ein weltklasse Soundtrack lassen einen das ganze gerne machen. Da es immer um das selbe geht ist es ein Gelegenheitsspiel, da auch die Story simple und doch niedlich ist. Zwischendurch gibt es noch Levels wo Reflexe gefragt sind, da es dort nur ums überleben geht. Spielzeit : 3-4 Stunden, wenn man fast alles einsammelt. Es ist auch möglich nur die Ziele abzuarbeiten und durch die Level zu rennen. Dann sind es vielleicht nur 2-3 Stunden. Wodurch man TurnOn im Angebot unter 10€ kaufen sollte.


+ Soundtrack
+ Grafik
+ Steuerung (nur WASD oder mit einem Controller)
+ viel zum einsammeln
+ einfach nur symphatisch 
+ Trotz "immer das selbe tun", kam bei mir keine Langeweile auf, wie bei vielen anderen Gelegenheitsspielen. Da jedes Level anders aufgebaut ist.
